page.title: 17UNEMPLOYMENT IN CAMBERLEY
page.content:
This year the careers office produced a{questionaire}throughout the{6th form leavers}in Collingwood , France Hill, and Tomlinscote for their future plans. Out of{772 replies}at the end of May,{203}said they will be needing the {YTS, 385}intended to stay at{school, {118}hoped to go to{college, 30 definitely found{employment, 22}will transfer to{6th form college,}and{14 are{unsure about their plans.}
On a list that was printed as a file for jobs that young people opted for _ 47 was the top score, which was secretarial/ typing, followed by 32 which was commerce/finance/ banking/soliciting,out of a total of 230.
